oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Approaches to asymptotics for U-statistics of Gibbs facet processes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vecera, Jakub
Benes, Viktor
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Probability
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: It is shown how the central limit theorem for U-statistics of spatial Poisson point processes can help to derive the central limit theorem for U-statistics of a Gibbs facet process from stochastic geometry. A full-dimensional submodel enables a simpler approach to the investigation. Finally the general situation is studied and the asymptotics with increasing intensity is described.
